item.description: This Royal Oak Selfwinding is designed in a 41mm 18k rose gold case with a smooth octagonal bezel, glareproofed sapphire crystal and caseback, screw-locked crown. It features a blue 'Grande Tapisserie' pattern on the dial and is complimented by a blue alligator strap with 18k rose gold AP folding clasp. Reference Number15510OR.OO.D315CR.02ModelRoyal Oak SelfwindingMovementAutomaticCase MaterialRose GoldBracelet MaterialBlue Alligator Leather DialBlue Case Diameter41mmYear2023ConditionNewBox & PapersOriginal box, original papersIndulge in the epitome of luxury and sophistication with the Audemars Piguet Royal Oak Selfwinding 41mm Rose Gold Blue Dial 15510OR.OO.D315CR.02. This exquisite timepiece from the iconic Royal Oak collection exudes timeless elegance and exceptional craftsmanship, making it a true statement of refined style. The 41mm case, meticulously crafted from lustrous rose gold, showcases the iconic octagonal shape that has become synonymous with Audemars Piguet. Its polished and satin-brushed finish adds depth and character to the design, while the integrated bracelet seamlessly blends with the case for a harmonious aesthetic. The captivating blue dial, adorned with the signature "Grande Tapisserie" pattern, is a mesmerizing canvas that catches the light from every angle. The rose gold hands and hour markers beautifully contrast against the deep blue backdrop, ensuring optimal legibility in any lighting condition. Powered by a self-winding movement, this timepiece offers precise and reliable timekeeping, while the date display at 3 o'clock adds practicality to its allure. With a water resistance of up to 50 meters, it is also built to withstand the rigors of everyday life. The Audemars Piguet Royal Oak Selfwinding 41mm Rose Gold Blue Dial 15510OR.OO.D315CR.02 represents the perfect blend of classic design and contemporary aesthetics. It is a testament to the brand's unwavering commitment to exceptional quality...
item.title: Audemars Piguet Royal Oak 15510OR.OO.D315CR.02 Selfwinding Rose Gold Blue Dial (2023)

item.description: Model Nautilus Model Number 5712/1A-001 Year 2014 Movement mechanical-automatic Original Box Yes Original Papers Yes Gender mens Diameter (mm) 40 Watch Case Material stainless-steel Watch Band Material stainless-steel Warranty 12Months Returns 14 Days Money Back Guarantee Product Code 05726This pre-owned stainless steel Patek Philippe Nautilus ref. 5712/1A-001 really shows off the true meaning of sophisticated elegance featuring a 40mm case, blue dial with moonphase, power reserve, date & seconds sub dial display on a stainless steel bracelet with a hidden folded clasp. Sophisticated as it can be, Patek Philippe wanted to show not only their aesthetics but also their master engineering through a sapphire crystal glass back showing you the calibre 240 PS IRM C LU automatic winding movement with approximately 48 hours power reserve. As you can see in the pictures, the watch is like new in absolute mint condition and comes complete with the original Patek Philippe box & papers. As you can see we are asking more than the retail price on this watch as its under very high demand and production is very low. You would expect to wait a few years before you can get your hands on one from the Patek Philippe boutique. This watch receives our personal recommendations for quality, investment value, functionality, pure elegance. We guarantee that this watch has been tested thoroughly for time accuracy, functionality and has been serviced to the highest standards according to the manufacturers specification. We have also performed a very precise condition check to determine the level of refurbishment required to meet our high standards of quality. This watch has also been checked...

Forty years later, it comprises a splendid collection of models for men and women. In steel, rose gold, white gold or two-tone combinations they accompany the most active lifestyles with incomparable class. Mechanical self-winding movement with date. Caliber CH 28520 C. Flyback chronograph. Black brown, gold applied hour markers with luminescent coating. Rose gold. Screw-down crown. Sapphire-crystal case back. Water-resistant to 120m. Case diameter (10-4 o'clock): 40.5 mm. Height: 12.2 mm. Alligator strap with rectangular scales, hand-stitched, matt dark brown. Nautilus fold-over clasp

item.description: SpecificationsMakePatek PhilippeModelNautilusReference7118/1R-001Diameter35,2mmCase Material18k Rose GoldDial ColorSilvery OpalineBezel TypeFixedBezel ColorPinkBezel Material18k Rose GoldCrystalScratch Resistant Sapphire crystalMovementSelf-winding mechanicalBracelet TypeBraceletBracelet Material18k Rose GoldClasp18k Rose Gold Nautilus fold-over claspFunctionsDate in an aperture, Hour, Minute, Sweep seconds handWater ResistanceUp to 60m/200ft (6 ATM)WarrantyBalance of Covered with Patek Philippe 2-Year International WarrantyLadies Watch Patek Philippe Nautilus 18k Rose Gold case with polished and satin finishes, 35,2mm, Reference 7118/1R-001 - has been the standard in luxury, because combine elegance, sporty style and timeless design. Is striking watch boasts a Silvery Opaline with horizontally embossed dial, 18k Rose Gold applied hour markers and Arabic numeral at the 12 o'clock positioning with a luminescent coating for easy readability in dim lighting as well as Dot minute markers around the outer rim. The sweep seconds hand and date in an aperture features at the 6 o'clock positioning give this model a clean profile and make keeping track of both date and time convenient. Complementing the elegant dial are 18k Rose Gold polished luminous alpha-style shape hands. A polished 18k Rose Gold Screw-down crown with a ribbed edge for easy grip and the Patek Philippe logo is completes the watch's harmony. The dial closed by a Scratch-resistant Sapphire Crystal. Sapphire-crystal too case back, which allows of the case, allows you to see the magical work of the movement. The wide hexagonal with polished and satin finishes bezel, in a blushing 18k Rose Gold, provides a wide view of the dial as the horizon is visible through the porthole. Moreover, the side protrusions, also called "lugs", are inspired by the hinges on these windows. The Model has caliber Patek Philippe Caliber 324 S C, with a self-winding mechanical movement containing 29 Jewels, with a power reserve of...
